claim: Joffrey Baratheon is portrayed by Colin Farrell.

claim: Joffrey Baratheon is portrayed by Colin Farrell.

claim: Joffrey Baratheon is portrayed by Colin Farrell.

claim: Joffrey Baratheon is portrayed by Colin Farrell.
